players.name: Bob
memory: You: "Charlie, any thoughts on who might have done this?"
Charlie: "I think we should focus on finding out who had the means and motive to kill Alice. Let's discuss any suspicious behaviors or patterns we've noticed."
Charlie: "Let's remember that Alice was last seen talking to Bob late at night. It's important we keep an eye on him and ask him about any alibis he might have."
You: "Charlie, I understand your concerns, but we must consider other possibilities too. Diana hasn't said a word yet. It's vital we hear from everyone before making hasty decisions."

Diana: "I believe it's important that we all share any information we have, no matter how insignificant it may seem. I haven't noticed anything out of the ordinary with Charlie, but I do find Bob's behavior suspicious given his late-night encounter with Alice."
